mapper.select: select uid,tmid,createtime,completetime,price from task where id=#{id}

select t.id,t.uid,ttid,pmid,t.name,message,startingaddress,purposeaddress,weight,tt.name as ttname ,pm.name as pmname from taskmessage t,tasktype tt,pricingmodel pm,task k where t.ttid=tt.id and t.pmid=pm.id and k.tmid=t.id and k.uid=#{uid} and completetime is null

select t.id,k.uid,ttid,pmid,t.name,message,startingaddress,purposeaddress,weight,tt.name as ttname ,pm.name as pmname,price from tasktype tt,pricingmodel pm,taskmessage t LEFT JOIN task k on t.id=k.tmid where t.ttid=tt.id and t.pmid=pm.id and t.uid=#{uid}
select uid,tmid,createtime,completetime,price from task where uid=#{uid} and completetime is null
select id,uid,tmid,createtime,completetime,price from task where tmid=#{tmid}
